page.title: 18ECOLOGY-DALMACOULTER SITE 2
page.content: TO CONTROL{POLLUTION}IN AND AROUND THE SITE THE DISTRICT COUNCIL INSISTS ON THE FOLLOWING:{PROTECTIVE NETTING {OR SHEETING}HAS TO BE USED ON VEHICLES USING THE SITE AS REQUIRED TO PREVENT SPILLAGE;{WHEEL-CLEANING EQUIPMENT}HAS BEEN PROVIDED ON SITE SO THAT NO MUD WILL BE DEPOSITED ON THE A73 BY VEHICLES USING THE TIP; SITE ROADS ARE SPRAYED WITH WATER IN DRY WEATHER TO SUPPRESS DUST;{MOVEABLE LITTER SCREENS ARE PROVIDED TO CONTAIN WIND-BLOWN LITTER AND{SCREEN TREE {PLANTING}HAS BEEN COMPLETED AROUND THE ENTIRE SITE. INFILLING AND EVENTUAL RESTORATION WILL DO MUCH TO IMPROVE THE APPEARANCE OF THE AREA.
